name: Tek Republic TM Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [Gaming Grade Laser Engine, Gaming-Grade laser sensors delivers 3600 DPI provides maximum precision, blinding speed, and ultra-smooth tracking., On-The-Fly Adjustable DPI, Allows in-game switching different levels of DPI facilitates precise targeting and fast-evasion gaming. you can shift from pixel-precise targeting (400 DPI) to lightning-fast responses and mirror-smooth tracking (up to 3,600 DPI) without pauses of the action, Weight-Tuning System, Adjustable weight tuning (up to xx grams) allows you change into the prefer weight on your mouse to balance for the control you need to dominate the competition., High-Speed USB 2.0, Up to 20G acceleration gives you precise aiming accuracy with minimal mouse movement.]
